required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Prevalence of COPD: First Epidemiological Data From a Large Region of Turkey
clinical_study.official_title: Inonu University, The Department of Pulmonary Medicine

brief_summary.textblock: The study was designed to obtain some baseline data on COPD in Malatya region of Turkey.

detailed_description.textblock: Sixty clusters from urban and rural regions were randomly selected. Ten and seven consecutive houses were included in the study from each urban and rural cluster respectively. A validated questionnaire on epidemiology of COPD was completed for each household over 18 by a pulmonary physician. Each subject performed the standard spirometric measurement and early bronchodilation testing.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- All households over 18 were included in the study
Exclusion Criteria:
- Age <18 years

overall_official.affiliation: Inonu University Department of Pulmonary Medicine
